description:
USN-3943-1 fixed a vulnerability in Wget. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 Kusano Kazuhiko discovered that Wget incorrectly handled certain inputs.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.
 (CVE-2019-5953)
title: Wget vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in Wget.
